name: Thousand Arrows
effect: Inflicts Wounds. Ranged. Remove the target's Immunity to Ground-Type Attacks and Flying Type Immunities they may have for the rest of the scene (making them susceptible to Terrain and Hazard move effects). If hitting a pokemon in the invulnerable Aerial turn of Fly or Bounce, cancel the move (putting the target back in range of combat), and the target does not lose any Immunities from Thousand Arrows.
description: Out of nowhere, pointy shards come raining from the sky towards the foes, even flying creatures will fall to the ground if they are knocked by them. Take cover, this is gonna hurt.
